content: julian vest raya budrevich www blissfulknits com the julian vest is knit in a bottom up fashion starting with a ribbed bottom the front features a v pattern that leads into a v-­ neck opening the shoulders have two buttonholes for ease of dressing the armholes and neck are finished with a small rib this is a very quick knit up pattern and looks gorgeous on sweet little babies and their big siblings the vest has been designed with no ease for a slim fitting look if extra girth is needed please knit a size up required skills basic knitting techniques stitch increases and basic
